questions.question: In the layer test of I^- and Br^-, if a reddish-brown layer comes first, then:
Statement-1: When H2S gas is passed through Na-nitroprusside solution, it gives a purple coloration. Statement-2: H2S is a weak acid.
options: (A) Statement-1 is true, statement-2 is true and statement-2 is the correct explanation for statement-1.
(B) Statement-1 is true, statement-2 is true but statement-2 is NOT the correct explanation for statement-1.
(C) Statement-1 is true, statement-2 is false.
(D) Statement-1 is false, statement-2 is true.

Cacodyl oxide is formed in the specific test of:
An aqueous solution of gas (X) gives white turbidity on passing H2S in the solution. Identify (X):

options: (A) It liberates NO gas on warming
(B) It liberates NO gas on shaking
(C) The charge of the central atom is +1 (relatively low enough)

options: (A) Absorption of some of the permanganate
(B) Adsorption of some of the permanganate
